job_tasks.phrase: e2e implementeren van POCs / applicaties en oplossingen voor interne & externe stakeholders binnen het domein van (digital) advertising.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the end-to-end implementation of applications and solutions, which is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI module - module voor het resizen, in & outpainten van advertentie banners voor adverteerders via integratie met generative AI services
job_tasks.justification: This describes a specific application of generative AI for image manipulation (resizing, in/outpainting), indicating a focus on generative AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen sales/adops chatbot obv email database
job_tasks.justification: Developing a chatbot based on an email database is a direct application of generative AI, likely involving prompt engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Opzetten speech-to-text followed by text-to-text proces voor het classificeren van audio/video streams
job_tasks.justification: This involves using generative AI for speech-to-text and text-to-text processing, which falls under generative AI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: Creatie van advertising prospectie lijsten obv bestaande klantenoverzicht
job_tasks.justification: Creating prospect lists based on customer data involves data processing and analysis, aligning with data engineering tasks for AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Creatie van een optimale media planning tool obv historische voorstellen
job_tasks.justification: Creating an optimization tool based on historical data suggests model development or at least the application of ML techniques for planning.

job_tasks.phrase: Highlights en next best actions definiëren obv campagne rapportering
job_tasks.justification: Defining highlights and next best actions based on campaign reporting implies using ML models to derive insights and recommendations.

job_tasks.phrase: Vergelijken van verschillende externe gen AI services (text, image, audio, video) in functie van een objectief
job_tasks.justification: Comparing different generative AI services directly relates to the specialization in generative AI technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Evalueren en opzetten van een RAG versus fine tuned LLM
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions evaluating and setting up RAG and fine-tuned LLMs, which are core GenAI specialization tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, …)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly indicates responsibilities related to DevOps and MLOps, including infra-as-code and CI/CD.

job_tasks.phrase: samen met de PO, project managers en stakeholders ontwikkel je generative AI POCs / modules, zowel standalone projecten als modules binnen bestaande applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: Developing GenAI POCs/modules, both standalone and within existing applications, is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: je interageert met stakeholders om de scope goed uit te spitten en kritische vragen te stellen
job_tasks.justification: Interacting with stakeholders to clarify scope and ask critical questions demonstrates business understanding and requirement gathering.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt reliable & robuuste interfaces voor andere DPG teams om mee te integreren, je integreert generative AI APIs op kostenefficiënte en schaalbare wijze
job_tasks.justification: Building robust interfaces for integration and integrating GenAI APIs in a cost-efficient and scalable manner are core software development and integration tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt snelle POCs om bepaalde externe tools te evalueren naar business value
job_tasks.justification: Building quick POCs to evaluate external tools for business value is a software development task focused on assessing utility.

job_tasks.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde applicaties / modules / processen / ..
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership and accountability for applications/modules is a software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: je bent zelfstandig en kan zonder veel problemen een webapplicatie opzetten binnen een AWS omgeving
job_tasks.justification: Setting up a web application in an AWS environment is a direct software development and deployment task.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-weekly sprint)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies like standups, refinements, retros, and demos indicates collaboration within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: interageert met stakeholders om de scope goed uit te spitten en kritische vragen te stellen
soft_skills.justification: Interacting with stakeholders to clarify scope and ask critical questions demonstrates business understanding and requirement gathering.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde applicaties / modules / processen / ..
soft_skills.justification: Taking ownership and accountability for applications/modules aligns with the innovation and ownership soft skill.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a role that involves a significant amount of software development and integration (Macro-Category A) such as implementing POCs, building interfaces, setting up web applications on AWS, and MLOps/DevOps practices. Simultaneously, it heavily emphasizes specific Generative AI tasks like developing chatbots, speech-to-text processes, comparing GenAI services, and evaluating RAG vs. fine-tuned LLMs (Macro-Category B). The balance between these two macro-categories, with a clear focus on Generative AI technologies, points to the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning various Generative AI tasks and core software engineering responsibilities, including MLOps. The tasks align well with the defined profiles, making the classification straightforward.
